hero.title: We Are ESAP
hero.tagline: Make a Wish to That Satellite

intro.main: The ESAP Project is a science fiction worldbuilding project that tells the story of a future where androids and humans coexist.
intro.world: In this world: Entropic Scattering Particles changed the nature of computation, Fluid Titanium allowed consciousness to persist, and three androids are searching for the meaning of existence.

lines.line1: It began on a late night in 2021,
lines.line2: With a gunshot and the first beat of an entropic heart,
lines.line3: From the moment human memory was uploaded into a mechanical body.

conclusion.sub: Not from this world, but from the self that was trapped.
